blocks.name: amgmwlem

blocks.content: Weighted arithmetic-geometric mean inequality for ` n = 2 ` (compare ~ amgm2d ). (Contributed by Kunhao Zheng, 20-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm amgmw2d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cmul, co(c2, ccxp, c3)), cle, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, crp))

} = {

thm amgmw2d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[^c]c1)[×](c2[^c]c3))[≤]((c0[×]c1)[+](c2[×]c3)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1[+]c3)= 1)
} = {
  3brtr3d(((c0[^c]c1)[×](c2[^c]c3)), cle, ((c0[×]c1)[+](c2[×]c3)), ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum](<" c0 . c2 ">[oF(^c)]<" c1 . c3 ">)), (CCfld[gsum](<" c0 . c2 ">[oF(×)]<" c1 . c3 ">)), w0)
  amgmwlem((mulGrp ` CCfld), <" c0 . c2 ">, <" c1 . c3 ">, (0[..^]2), w0)
  a1i(w0, (0[..^]2)∈ Fin)
  fzofi(nat0, nat2)
  mp1i(w0, (0[..^]2)≠ ∅, 0 ∈(0[..^]2))
  mpbir(0 ∈(0[..^]2), 2 ∈ ℕ)
  2nn()
  lbfzo0(nat2)
  ne0i(nat0, (0[..^]2))
  sylib(w0, (<" c0 . c2 "> :(0[..^]2)→ ℝ+), (<" c0 . c2 "> :(0[..^](# ` <" c0 . c2 ">))→ ℝ+))
  syl(w0, (<" c0 . c2 "> :(0[..^](# ` <" c0 . c2 ">))→ ℝ+), <" c0 . c2 "> ∈ Word(ℝ+))
  s2cld(c0, c2, crp, w0)
  wrdf(<" c0 . c2 ">, crp)
  feq2i(<" c0 . c2 ">, (0[..^](# ` <" c0 . c2 ">)), crp, (0[..^]2))
  oveq2i(nat0, cfzo, (# ` <" c0 . c2 ">), nat2)
  s2len(c0, c2)
  sylib(w0, (<" c1 . c3 "> :(0[..^]2)→ ℝ+), (<" c1 . c3 "> :(0[..^](# ` <" c1 . c3 ">))→ ℝ+))
  syl(w0, (<" c1 . c3 "> :(0[..^](# ` <" c1 . c3 ">))→ ℝ+), <" c1 . c3 "> ∈ Word(ℝ+))
  s2cld(c1, c3, crp, w0)
  wrdf(<" c1 . c3 ">, crp)
  feq2i(<" c1 . c3 ">, (0[..^](# ` <" c1 . c3 ">)), crp, (0[..^]2))
  oveq2i(nat0, cfzo, (# ` <" c1 . c3 ">), nat2)
  s2len(c1, c3)
  eqtrd((CCfld[gsum]<" c1 . c3 ">), nat1, (c1[+]c3), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (CCfld[gsum]<" c1 . c3 ">)=(c1[+]c3), CCfld ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ ℂ, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  rpcnd(c1, w0)
  rpcnd(c3, w0)
  gsumws2(ccnfld, c1, cc, c3, caddc)
  eqtrd(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum](<" c0 . c2 ">[oF(^c)]<" c1 . c3 ">)), ((c0[^c]c1)[×](c2[^c]c3)), ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum]<"(c0[^c]c1).(c2[^c]c3)">), w0)
  oveq2d((mulGrp ` CCfld), cgsu, (<" c0 . c2 ">[oF(^c)]<" c1 . c3 ">), <"(c0[^c]c1).(c2[^c]c3)">, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (<" c0 . c2 ">[oF(^c)]<" c1 . c3 ">)= <"(c0[^c]c1).(c2[^c]c3)">, (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ+), (c1 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c3 ∈ ℝ+))
  ofs2(c0, crp, c2, c1, crp, c3, ccxp)
  syl3anc(w0, ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum]<"(c0[^c]c1).(c2[^c]c3)">)=((c0[^c]c1)[×](c2[^c]c3)), (mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd, (c0[^c]c1)∈ ℂ, (c2[^c]c3)∈ ℂ)
  mp1i(w0, (mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd, CCfld ∈ Ring)
  ringmgp(ccnfld, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  rpcnd((c0[^c]c1), w0)
  rpcxpcld(c0, c1, w0)
  rpred(c1, w0)
  rpcnd((c2[^c]c3), w0)
  rpcxpcld(c2, c3, w0)
  rpred(c3, w0)
  gsumws2((mulGrp ` CCfld), (c0[^c]c1), cc, (c2[^c]c3), cmul)
  mgpbas(cc, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  mgpplusg(cmul, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  eqid((mulGrp ` CCfld))
  cnfldmul()
  eqtrd((CCfld[gsum](<" c0 . c2 ">[oF(×)]<" c1 . c3 ">)), ((c0[×]c1)[+](c2[×]c3)), (CCfld[gsum]<"(c0[×]c1).(c2[×]c3)">), w0)
  oveq2d(ccnfld, cgsu, (<" c0 . c2 ">[oF(×)]<" c1 . c3 ">), <"(c0[×]c1).(c2[×]c3)">, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (<" c0 . c2 ">[oF(×)]<" c1 . c3 ">)= <"(c0[×]c1).(c2[×]c3)">, (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ+), (c1 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c3 ∈ ℝ+))
  jca(w0, c0 ∈ ℝ+, c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  jca(w0, c1 ∈ ℝ+, c3 ∈ ℝ+)
  ofs2(c0, crp, c2, c1, crp, c3, cmul)
  syl3anc(w0, (CCfld[gsum]<"(c0[×]c1).(c2[×]c3)">)=((c0[×]c1)[+](c2[×]c3)), CCfld ∈ Mnd, (c0[×]c1)∈ ℂ, (c2[×]c3)∈ ℂ)
  mp1i(w0, CCfld ∈ Mnd, CCfld ∈ Ring)
  cnring()
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  rpcnd((c0[×]c1), w0)
  rpmulcld(c0, c1, w0)
  rpcnd((c2[×]c3), w0)
  rpmulcld(c2, c3, w0)
  gsumws2(ccnfld, (c0[×]c1), cc, (c2[×]c3), caddc)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldadd()
}
